name: Jetpack
description:
Jetpack
ZX Spectrum Style is back!



Rescue Colonists and Save Earth from Aliens Attack!
Get ready, mission starts August 2020!



Forgotten gem from the 80`s, found on tape in the attic next to ZX Spectrum 48 (mint condition).
Jetpack is a tribute to the best times in arcade games history, games and their creators.

Main Features include,
- 2 types of Gameplay:
- Old School - combination of great ZX Spectrum hits,
- New School - classic space runner
- A lot of ZX Spectrumness
- Retro Music and sound effects
A lot more Jetpack secrets to be revealed soon!

Stay tuned and WISHLIST Jetpack today.
